titleStmt.title: The second parte of the co[n]futacion of Tyndals answere in whyche is also confuted the chyrche that Tyndale deuyseth. And the chyrche also that frere Barns deuyseth. Made by syr Thomas More knyght.
Confutacyon of Tyndales answere. Part 2
titleStmt.author: More, Thomas, Sir, Saint, 1478-1535.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
